Add Author Info to PSA Project

psa_add_author.Rd

Adds a person information to the Authors@R section of the DESCRIPTION file, creating that field if necessary. Acts as a wrapper for the function usethis::use_author() function.

Usage

psa_add_author(
  given = NULL,
  family = NULL,
  ORCID_number = NULL,
  email = NULL,
  role = NULL
)

Arguments

given

given name of author

family

family name of author

ORCID_number

ORCID number associated with author

email

email address of author

role

vector containing roles of author in the project, usually "aut" and "cre"; refer to utils::person() documentation for more information.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
psa_add_author(
  given = "Lucy",
  family = "van Pelt",
  role = c("aut", "cre"),
  email = "lucy@example.com",
  ORCID_number = "LUCY-ORCID-ID")
} # }
